text: Amanda Lemon (born 16 July 1987) is a New Zealand water polo player. She competed for the New Zealand women's national water polo team in the 2019 World Aquatics Championships. == References == == Other websites == * taurangawaterpolo * amanda-lemon * world-champs-teams Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand water polo players
title: Amanda Lemon
